name: Zapi
headline: No Code AI Site Builder
description: Build stunning content sites in seconds with no-code using AI

founders.name: Jonathan Low, Founder
founders.description:
Jonathan is the co-founder and CEO of Zapi.

Prior, Jonathan worked at NTUC Enterprise leading product development and digital transformation for 2 business units. Between 2015 to 2019, he co-founded and led product development at a groceries startup in SEA named Honestbee that grew to $108M in annual GMV across 8 markets.

founders.name: Thomas Jiang, Founder
founders.description:
Thomas is the co-founder of Zapi.

Prior, Thomas worked as engineer no. 2 in a B2B startup selling enterprise compliance software which was acquired.

generated_description:
### Zapi: The No-Code AI Site Builder

Founded in 2022 and located in the tech hub of Singapore, Zapi is shaking things up in the world of website creation with its robust no-code AI site builder. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, this lean startup, with a dedicated team of just two employees, is focused on making the web more accessible to those without technical skills.

#### Mission and Offering

Zapi's mission is simple yet powerful: to empower users to create stunning content sites in seconds using natural language. Forget about the complexities of coding or the wait times typical of traditional website builders. With Zapi, you just describe what you envision, and the platform conjures it to life instantly. It's all about rapid iteration and control—users can make changes without needing to rely on developers.

#### Key Features

- **No Coding Required**: You can create beautiful landing pages just by describing what you want.
- **Lightning Fast**: Pages can be generated and deployed in mere seconds, bypassing the long development cycles.
- **Complete Control**: Users have the freedom to tweak their sites directly—no middlemen needed.

#### Pricing Structure

Zapi offers a generous 14-day free trial, enabling users to experience its full capabilities risk-free. Following the trial, the core subscription plan starts at $30 per month, providing features like:

- Unlimited AI messages
- 1-click deployment
- Custom domain support
- Access for a single user and project

#### Resources and Support

Zapi provides a wealth of resources for users. From guides to direct support channels (like Discord), they ensure that help is readily available.

For more information or to dive in yourself, you can visit their website at [heyZapi.com](https://heyzapi.com).

#### Conclusion

In the ever-evolving landscape of web development, Zapi represents a significant leap forward by removing barriers for non-tech users. It’s not just about building sites; it’s about making the process effortless and efficient. If you're looking to create a landing page quickly without diving into code, Zapi might just be the tool for you.
